[Home](../../) &gt; [@rimitive/view](../) &gt; LoadModule

## LoadModule variable

Load module - provides the load() factory for async data boundaries.

**Signature:**

```typescript
LoadModule: Module<'load', LoadFactory, {
    signal: SignalFactory;
}>
```

## Example


```ts
import { compose } from '@rimitive/core';
import { LoadModule } from '@rimitive/view/load';

const { load, signal } = compose(LoadModule);
```
